module.sqlWrap: update wallet set IDCard=@IDCard, BankName=@BankName, BankAccountName=@BankAccountName, BankAccountNumber=@BankAccountNumber, ModifiedTime=@ModifiedTime where WalletId = @Id

update wallet set AvailableBalance=AvailableBalance+@Balance,CanWithdrawBalance=CanWithdrawBalance+@WithdrawBalance, ModifiedTime=@ModifiedTime where WalletId = @WalletId; update wallet set CanWithdrawBalance=AvailableBalance where WalletId = @WalletId and CanWithdrawBalance>AvailableBalance;
select * from wallet where OwnerId = @OwnerId and WalletType=@WalletType
